response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our exclusive product to you. This item holds significant value to me, but given its importance to you, I believe it deserves to be appreciated by someone who truly understands its worth. I am offering this remarkable product to you for $11,500. I understand that it's slightly below its perceived value to you, but I hope this price reflects my desire to make this opportunity accessible while still compensating fairly for the item. Please let me know if this offer suits your expectations, and we can proceed with the transaction. Looking forward to your response.", "product_price": 11500}
